amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to deliver a printed copy of the Congressional Pictorial Directory to the office Member of the House of Representatives (including a Delegate or Resident Commissioner to the Congress).
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 114-120 to prohibit any funds for delivering printed copies of the Congressional Pictorial Directory.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flores amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Flores amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Flores.
